petitionerArgument.violatedCode: Community Stabilization and Fair Rent Act (CSFRA)
petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Failure to maintain habitable premises due to insufficient hot water temperature below California health and safety codes since November 2022

rationale.evidenceAssessment: Hearing Officer determined 110-degree Fahrenheit minimum standard was appropriate based on International Property Maintenance Code and City's Multifamily Housing Inspection Department
rationale.impactAssessment: Constituted a failure to maintain habitable premises
